mapper.select: SELECT A.sched_id, A.dept_id, A.content, A.start_dt, A.end_dt, A.start_time, A.end_time FROM dept_sched A, (SELECT * FROM dept start with dept_id =#{deptId} connect by prior dept_id = upper_dept_id order siblings by dept_id)B where A.dept_id = B.dept_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dept_sched ( sched_id, dept_id, content, start_dt, end_dt, start_time, end_time ) VALUES ( SCHED_SEQ.nextval, #{deptId}, #{content}, TO_DATE(#{startDt}||#{startTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), TO_DATE(#{endDt}||#{endTime},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), #{startTime}, #{endTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT sched_id, dept_id, content, to_char(start_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as start_dt, to_char(end_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') as end_dt, start_time, end_time FROM dept_sched
and sched_id = #{schedId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE dept_sched SET content = #{content}, start_dt = TO_DATE(#{startDt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), end_dt = TO_DATE(#{endDt},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi'), start_time = #{startTime}, end_time = #{endTime}
and sched_id = #{schedId}
